cause.description:
The People Speak is an educational campaign designed to engage young people on the global issues that will shape their futures. By engaging them on issues of poverty reduction, global health, climate change and more, TPS is inspiring young people to be a positive force for change in the world. Through its projects for high school and college students and its website, TPS offers many opportunities for young people to learn about important issues, exchange ideas and take action in their communities.
1. Young people should have the opportunity to be engaged on global issues
cause.mission: Engage young people around global issues
cause.name: The People Speak
